title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-3.7 - Welder's qualification record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-3.7 - Welder's qualification record

State Regulations

Any person undertaking repairs or alterations shall
have available at the job site a copy of such person's welder's qualification
traceable to a supporting weld procedure specification and procedure
qualification record of same. These documents shall be made available to the
authorized inspector. If more than one welder is undertaking the repair or
alteration a welder's qualification record for each welder shall be on the job
site. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-3.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
